meanings.definition: A device or motto, especially one used as a heraldic emblem
meanings.sent1: The impresa on the shield symbolized courage and strength.
meanings.sent2: The family crest featured an impresa with a lion and a sword.
meanings.sent3: The impresa on the flag made everyone laugh because it showed a dancing bear.
meanings.sent4: Her impresa was like a beacon of hope in the dark times.
meanings.sent5: The intricate impresa etched on the armor was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A symbol or emblem representing a concept or idea
meanings.sent1: The dove was chosen as the impresa of peace and harmony.
meanings.sent2: The impresa of the company was a tree, symbolizing growth and stability.
meanings.sent3: His impresa of a smiling sun was a cheerful reminder of better days.
meanings.sent4: The impresa of a broken chain represented freedom and liberation.
meanings.sent5: The impresa of a key unlocking a door signified new opportunities.
